inclusion.criterion: Paget's Disease of Bone diagnosis confirmed
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Chronic Steroid use greater than or equal to 3 months within the last 6 months
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has kidney disease and Paget's Disease of Bone, but no renal transplantation, under 18 years old, unable to provide informed consent, or chronic steroid use.
